name: Horsehead Nebula Trek
description:
Made for MiniJam 24 with the theme of Space, and limitation of mouse only.

Fly around the Horsehead Nebula on your quest to find the three keys!

Evade the enemy army and pick up scrap parts to complete the quest!

Mouse is used to aim and move, and left click to shoot.

If you go past your weight capacity, you will slow down. Pick up fuel parts to increase your maximum load!

Good luck space cadet, and have fun!

Game done by Topper

Galaxy art done by ShadeLowen
